channel.title: The Daily Pratchett
channel.description: A quote from Sir Terry Pratchett every day.

item.title: 14-Dec-16
item.description:
"In the Beginning there was nothing, which exploded."

- Terry Pratchett, Lords and Ladies

item.title: 13-Dec-16
item.description:
"Real children don't go hoppity-skip unless they are on drugs."

Susan, the ultimate sensible governess - Terry Pratchett, Hogfather

item.title: 12-Dec-16
item.description:
"Cats don't hunt seals. They would if they knew what they were and where to find them. But they don't, so that's all right."

- Terry Pratchett, The Unadulterated Cat

item.title: 11-Dec-16
item.description:
"One day a tortoise will learn how to fly."

- Terry Pratchett, Small Gods

item.title: 10-Dec-16
item.description:
"WHAT CAN THE HARVEST HOPE FOR, IF NOT FOR THE CARE OF THE REAPER MAN?"

Death appeals to Azrael - Terry Pratchett, Reaper Man
